Title: Extends the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax from 11/30/2025 to 11/30/2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the expiration of the authorization to the county of Genesee to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax
